lyric.verse: Ki ni kawan ore wa yakusoku wa yaburu Sonna sabishii koto iwanaide Iyaiya mada ganbaru Wakareta STRANGER sagasu Mata aitai ima sugu aitai Inzaimaki no haraiki no kyookoo Ore wa itsu demo shumi de notte iru DISTORTION T te ni ireta DISCHORD MI-MI-MI-MILE POLLUTION NO. 9 DISTORTION TRAIN te ni ireta DESTROY YU-YU-YU-YUARE POLLUTION NO. 1
